title: CAN'T REDEEM MY DREADKNIGHT GAREN CODE

embed.description: Imgur: The magic of the Internet

body: When i try to redeem my code for the free garen skin i get an error. It says "There was a problem fullfilling your store items, please try again. If this problem persists please contact us at support.riotgames.com." Anyone know the fix?

replies.body: Sorry for the trouble!  The crusader of justice has been added to your account now.  :)
i cant get it... i have the code but i get this error too. can someone help me?:D
i am eu ne can u add me garen skin too pls,i cannot redeem it ,same problem as theese guys...ty!{{champion:86}}
Same problem with me. I cannot also recieve garen skin when i enter my redeem code
Guys, I've heard about this, but I don't know how to get my code
same problem here, could you fix it please?

Could you add it to my acc as well? I got trist and ali but this one 

thx
I have the same problem. It worked with the tristana and the alistar skin.
Same problem here, followed LoL on Twitter, got code, same error :/
Same problem here, I can't redeem Garen skin

Hello, unfortunately I cannot redeem the garen code either, and the tristana too. I liked the fb page and fallowed on twitter.

Edit: It doesn't work to redeem the Alistar code either.
